Services

High-quality, patient-centered care across specialties.

Dermatology procedures

In-office minor procedures.

  • Cryotherapy
  • Biospy
  • Comedone extraction

Physiotherapy

Rehabilitation and mobility programs.

  • Post-op rehab
  • Sports injuries
  • Back pain

Vaccinations

Adult and pediatric immunizations.

  • Influenza
  • COVID-19
  • Child schedule

Prep: Bring vaccine history if available

Telemedicine

Virtual visits with our doctors

  • Follow-ups
  • e-Prescriptions
  • Results review

Laboratory

Comprehensive blood and diagnostics.

  • CBC
  • Lipid profile
  • HbA1c

Prep: Hydrate well; morning collection preferred

General Check-ups

Annual physicals and preventive care.

  • Ultrasound
  • Plain X-ray
  • MRI (partner)

Prep: Fast 8 hours for blood tests when advised
